title: How to reset password?
author_id: go to settings and click reset.

title: How to update billing info?
content: Go to the billing section in your profile.

title: Connection issues troubleshooting
content: Check your internet connection and try again.

title: Account deletion policy
content: You can delete your account from the privacy settings.

title: Refund policy
content: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days.
